content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining structure at position(x=41, y=-82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41, y=-82) 
-  Wooden chest (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) 
-  Wooden chest (position x=41.5, y=-83.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-81.5)

### Furnace at position(x=0, y=0)
Consists of a furnace with coal fuel source

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
-  Make sure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
-  Ensure the agent has the correct permissions to access the chest

### Errors when inserting items into a burner-mining-drill
-  Make sure the burner-mining-drill's inventory is not full before attempting to insert items
-  Ensure the agent has the correct permissions to access the burner-mining-drill

### Errors when using a burner-inserter
-  Make sure the burner-inserter has a valid source of items to pick up
-  Ensure the burner-inserter has a valid destination to drop items

### Errors when using a furnace
-  Make sure the furnace has a valid fuel source
-  Ensure the furnace has valid ingredients to smelt

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
*   Important variables:
    *   `coal_chest`: a chest entity used to store coal
    *   `drill`: a burner-mining-drill entity used to mine coal
    *   `inserter`: a burner-inserter entity used to move items
    *   `furnace`: a furnace entity used to smelt items
